me.mcblueparrot.spade.api.recipe

Interface CookingRecipe

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable, Recipe
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlastingRecipe, CampfireRecipe, SmeltingRecipe, SmokingRecipe

    public interface CookingRecipe
extends Recipe
    Represents a cooking recipe (smelting, blasting, smoking and campfire).
